title: Amazing LTO Chase Ink Plus Has a 70,000 Point Offer Frugal Travel Guy

type_specific.selection: There is currently a Limited Time Offer (LTO) for the Chase Ink Plus Business Card where you can earn 70,000 bonus points after you spend $5,000 on purchases in the first 3 months from account opening.
